description.text:
What does the book say?

  $(b;winter)- The knight of the black eye possessed the power to of the ocean itself. After the war he sailed off into the great ocean and was never seen again. - $()

 Hmm...he sailed off....on a ship I guess? How do we know where ship ended up? What was it's destination?
....Argh! It could as well be shipwrecked and be anywhere!
